"The Seasonal Event":
"Seasonal Events are special events that only last for a limited time.

During this event, within the Kvaris Region, the map and the appearance of some enemies will change, and limited-time Rappies will appear."

"During this event,
the ARKS Researcher of Strange Phenomena, Xiandy, appears in all ARKS bases to act as a guide for the event.

You can talk to Xiandy to accept Limited-Time Tasks, or to trade Seasonal Points for items."

"During this Seasonal Event, there will be additional Event-related Daily/Weekly Tasks.

To learn more about Seasonal Events, talk to Xiandy and select \"Ask about the Seasonal Event\"."
